credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Stage design
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash, graphite
description: Horizontal rectangle. The plan corresponds to a broad quatrefoil. The three central parts at the front are decorated with trophies. At left is a group of weapons, at right of colors. Another object is beside them. Above the entablature, in the center, is a trophy and in the corners bunches of feathers.
name: Drawing
